modName: BGM Glass and Makers Mark - Integration
summary:
For those using both BGM Glass and Makers Mark Ingots,
'BGM Glass and Elven Armour and Weapons' moonstone ingot with 'Makers Mark Ingots' mark on it.
descriptionHtml:
I use both cmdo's "BGM Glass and Elven Armour and Weapons", and mikeomni's "Makers Mark Ingots"
and both of them replace the moonstone ingot (one to change the color, the other to add the 'makers mark'), so I decided to merge the alterations into a single ingot.
This is the BGM ingot, with the Makers Mark logo on it.

Install this AFTER both BGM Glass and Maker Mark Ingot are installed, and allow it to replace the ingotmoonstone01.dds and ingotmoonstone01_n.dds files.

To install,
either install using Nexus Mod Manager,
or extract the files to your Skyrim folder.

BGM Glass and Elven Armour and Weapons:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2060/

Makers Mark Ingots:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3524/
author: Ahouroushi
